description: Manage connected registry resources with Azure Container Registries.

commands.name: az acr connected-registry create
commands.summary: Create a connected registry for an Azure Container Registry.
examples:
az acr connected-registry create --registry mycloudregistry --name myconnectedregistry \
    --repository "app/hello-world" "service/mycomponent"

az acr connected-registry create --registry mycloudregistry  --name myreadonlyacr \
    --mode readonly --parent myconnectedregistry --sync-token mySyncTokenName

az acr connected-registry create -r mycloudregistry -n myreadonlyacr -p myconnectedregistry \
    --repository "app/mycomponent" -m ReadOnly -s "0 12 * * *" -w PT4H \
    --client-tokens myTokenName1 myTokenName2

commands.name: az acr connected-registry deactivate
commands.summary: Deactivate a connected registry from Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr connected-registry deactivate -r mycloudregistry -n myconnectedregistry

commands.name: az acr connected-registry delete
commands.summary: Delete a connected registry from Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr connected-registry delete --registry mycloudregistry --name myconnectedregistry
az acr connected-registry delete -r mycloudregistry -n myconnectedregistry --cleanup

commands.name: az acr connected-registry get-settings
commands.summary: Retrieve information required to activate a connected registry, and creates or rotates the sync token credentials.
examples: az acr connected-registry get-settings -r mycloudregistry -n myconnectedregistry --parent-protocol http
az acr connected-registry get-settings -r mycloudregistry -n myconnectedregistry --generate-password 1 --parent-protocol https

commands.name: az acr connected-registry list
commands.summary: List all the connected registries under the current parent registry.
examples: az acr connected-registry list --registry mycloudregistry --output table
az acr connected-registry list --registry mycloudregistry --no-children --output table
az acr connected-registry list -r mycloudregistry -p myconnectedregistry --output table

commands.name: az acr connected-registry list-client-tokens
commands.summary: List all the client tokens associated to a specific connected registries.
examples: az acr connected-registry list-client-tokens -r mycloudregistry -n myreadonlyacr -o table

commands.name: az acr connected-registry show
examples: az acr connected-registry show --registry mycloudregistry --name myreadonlyacr --output table

commands.name: az acr connected-registry update
commands.summary: Update a connected registry for an Azure Container Registry.
examples:
az acr connected-registry update --registry mycloudregistry --name myconnectedregistry \
    --remove-client-tokens myTokenName1 --add-client-tokens myTokenName2 myTokenName3

az acr connected-registry update --registry mycloudregistry --name myreadonlyacr \
    --sync-schedule "0 12 * * *" --sync-window PT4H
